column4: dont forget that he needs to use the right module (if he has now set it to use ndiswrapper)
I have never used NDIS wrapper, what does he need to blacklist or is there more to it?

if he uses ndiswapper he needs to blacklist the bcm43xx module.  If he has already been instructed to do so by a README or HOWTO while setting up ndiswapper then he'll need to "unblacklist" it in order to use the bcm43xx + bcm43-fwcutter method
